verses.text: Mamin Jehová, ab' wal jun in lesal tik. In gana to sk'och wav t'ayach.
Manh ach b'at mikan t'ayin ayic ay in och ilk'olal. Elokab' t'a a k'ool ab'an in lesal. Comonoc elanhchamel tzach tak'wi t'ayin ayic tzach wavtani.
Van slajwiem in k 'inal icha wal satem te' tab'. Van stz'ab'at in b'aquil icha te' cuxk'ak' swab'i.
Manhxalaj yip in pixan swab'i, icha wal taquinh ank'ultak in ticnaik. Maxtzac ochlaj in wejel.
Ix och lotzan in tz'umal t'a in b'aquil yuj b'aj tzin te oq'ui.
Lajan in icha junok nok' cujub' t'a tzinan lu'um, ma icha nok' xoch' b'aj ay te' k'atac pat.
Max ochlaj in wayanh. Lajan in yet' nok' much tzek' sch'ocojil t'a chontac pat.
Ha heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin, junjun k'u stzuntzej kus in k'ool heb'. Tzin yak'anpax b'inaj heb' t'a skatab'.
Ichato tik'aq'uil taanh in wael tzin wa''a. Scalej sb'a yal in sat yet' tas swuk'ej.
Yujnhej a k'ak'alk'olal yet' yowal a k'ol t'ayin, ix in ik'ank'e waan, ix lajwi chi' ix in a yumankanb'at t'a najat.
Icha junok enhul wanxo satemi, icha wal chi' in k 'inal. Van in tacjiem icha wal anh ank'ultak swab'i.
Ha achxo Mamin Jehová, Yajal ach t'a masanil tiempo. Ol ach nachajnhejcot t'a masanil k 'inal.
Cotanh, ok'okab' a k'ol t'a Sion. Toxo ix ja stiempoal to tzak'xi a wach'k'olal t'ay.
Ha onh a chekab' onh tik xajan Sion cuuj, wach'chom lanhchajnac emi. Tzonh oq'ui yujto ix jujiemi.
Masanil nación yet' heb' winh sreyal yol yib'anhk’inal tik, ol xiv heb' t'a stziquiquial Jehová te b'inajnac.
Ayic ol b'oxik'e Sion, ol sch'oxan sb'ha t'a skal stziquiquial ta'.
A' ol chaan slesal heb' malaj mach skolwaj yet'oc. Manh ol spatiquejel-laj heb', ayic ol yalan sb'a heb' t'ay.
Tz'ib'chajokab'kan t'a yol ch'anh uum tas ol sk'uloc Jehová yic wach' a heb' manto aljoclaj, ol yal wach' lolonel heb' t'ay.
Ato t'a sk'ojnub' Jehová t'a satcha’anh ol yilanemta lum lum tik,
yic wach' ol b'o yaj b'aj stewi heb' presowum. Ol scolankanel heb' winh preso yaji, heb' ayoch chamel t'a yib'anh,
yic ol aljoquel yab'ixal t'a Sion, yic tz'alchajpax wach' lolonel t'ay t'a Jerusalén.
Yuj chi' ol ja masanil nación ul yak'em sb'ha t'a Jehová chi'.
Ix yik'anel wip Jehová ayic ayto in k 'inal, ix tzap in k 'inal yuj.
Ix walan t'ay: Ach in Diosal, manh ak' tzap in k 'inal. Ha wal a k 'inal a ach tik, malaj slajwub'.
Atax t'a yichb’anel a b'onakkanem yich yol yib'anhk’inal tik, a ach pax a b'onakkan satcha’anh.
Ol satel masanil juntzanh tik, a achxo jun, ayachnhejeq'ui. Ha juntzanh tik ol ixtaxoc, icha sk'ab'ik'och junok k'apac, ol a k'excaneli, icha wal sk'exanel junok sk'a pichul heb' anima, syumankaneli.
Ha achxo jun, anheja' aji, malaj b'ak'uinh ol ach sateloc.
Ha heb' cuninal a onh a chekab' onh tik, junk'olal ol aj heb' t'a ichanh. Yuj a colwal, malaj tas ol ik'an heb'.
